title: Pixel 3 XL is stuck in boot after 1) first google logo: 2)animation: and at 3) the second google l
content: Pixel 3XL is stuck in boot after 1) first google logo: 2)animation: and at 3) the second google logo with the faint line traveling right below it. Nothing I've tried gets me beyond that place. I've gone into Safe  Mode where I am told the "Device state" is "locked" and the "Enter Reason" says "combo key". What do I do now? None of the Menu keys I've tried have done anything.
